Stage 2: Idea Drafter (sees accumulated context)
Stage 3: Expert Scoring fan-out (6 experts, cross-pollination)
Stage 4: Refinement (sees everything)
Stage 5: Selection (validate → cluster → curate)
Accumulated context pattern: format each stage output as InputField for next stage.
